base_description: Curved silver faucet with a single lever handle.
part_description: Includes one curved spout and one cylindrical lever handle on a circular base, positioned to the side.
internal_interaction_description: The lever handle controls the water flow through the spout. When lifted or rotated, it adjusts the water pressure and temperature, directing water through the internal channels to the spout.
external_interaction_description: The faucet is mounted on a sink or countertop, interacting with plumbing to deliver water. Users operate the lever to control water flow and temperature for tasks like washing hands or dishes.
